DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator want compare glucose handling ( insulin secretion insulin sensitivity ) 100 person low 50 person normal-high level vitamin D , use hyperglycemic clamp technique , sugar give intravenously 3 hour order keep blood sugar level 10 mmol/L . Those low vitamin D level randomize treatment vitamin D3 ( cholecalciferol ) 40 000 IU/week placebo 6 month new clamp perform . The study hypothesis person low vitamin D level impair glucose handling might improve vitamin D supplementation .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D AND Glucose Handling Evaluated Glucose Clamp
